Name: El Momento Perfecto
Ingredients: 45 ml Light white rum (charcoal-filtered 1-4 years old)
Instructions: STIR all ingredients with ice and fine strain into ice-filled glass (preferably over a chunk of block ice).
Review: A rum and marmalade Negroni -like drink.
History: Adapted from a recipe created in 2011 by Daniel Bovey at Sahara Bar in Reading, England.
